text: Christopher Charles Mintz-Plasse (born June 20, 1989 in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California) is an American actor. He is famous for playing the character Fogell/McLovin in the movie Superbad and Chris D'Amico/Red Mist in the movie Kick-Ass. ==Filmography== *Superbad as Fogell/McLovin (2007) *Role Models as Augie Farks (2008) *Year One as Isaac (2009) *How to Train Your Dragon as Fishlegs (2010) *Kick-Ass as Chris D'Amico/Red Mist (2010) *Marmaduke as Giuseppe (2010) *Fright Night as "Evil" Ed Thompson (2011) *Movie 43 (2011) *ParaNorman (2012) as Alvin (Voice) *How to Train Your Dragon 2 (2014) as Fishlegs (Voice) Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Christopher Mintz-Plasse
